'Consequence' is an album by American saxophonist Jackie McLean recorded in
1965, but not released on Blue Note until 1979 as LT-994. In 1993, it was
released as part of the four-disc Mosaic compilation [[The Complete Blue Note
1964-66 Jackie McLean Sessions]], which was limited to 5,000 copies. In 2005, it
was finally released on a limited edition CD as Blue Note 11428. [http://www.jazzdisco.org/jackie-mclean/catalog/#blue-note-lt-
994 Jackie McLean discography] accessed October 18, 2010
